nodes.text: The Nightsister Stronghold was located on Dathomir, the homeworld of the Nightsisters. It served as a refugee settlement for the exiled witches.
Right outside the walls of the stronghold was the entrance to the Rancor Cave, where many rancors lived. The entrance to the Chamber of Banishment could be found in the deepest part of the caverns.

The Nightsister Stronghold appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
